lines.text: Look at that road! I used to do ten miles on that road like it was nothin' - just to pitch a game! Now I can hardly reach it, let alone walk on it!
You told me once, "A man has to know where he's goin'!" Where are you goin', Monte?

[after accidentally shooting himself in the leg]
I shot the wrong rabbit!

Honey, do you know there's a tailor in Chicago that gives a suit of clothes away to any ballplayer that hits the scoreboard in center field? As of yesterday the New York Yankees are the best dressed team in baseball.
Nah, I'm through gambling. Well, I found out what it's like to lose, and what it's like to win. Why keep at it?
Boy, I took so many dancing lessons through the season, it's a wonder I've even got strength enough to pitch.
